name: LD48 - Eat Prey Live
description:
My entry for LD48 - theme: "Deeper and deeper".

This is a pretty low-key / ambient kind of survival game. Eat food, get bigger, when you hit full size go deeper and continue. See how deep you can get!

Controls:

Left / Right / Up cursors - Move

Space bar - Dash

S / M toggle (S)ound effects and (M)usic

I wanted to experiment with no HUD, so most of the important information is animated on your character.
